sources.title: Red Island | Full Movie | Mystery Sci-Fi Survival
sources.description:
Red Island - A distressed couple become stranded on an isolated island only to get hunted by an unforeseen force.
2018. Stars: Alex Essoe, Georgie Daburas, Tawny West

metadata.Plot: Thomas lives in a military base on colony of Madagascar, with his parents and friends. He gradually becomes aware of territorial and sexual politics while finding an outlet for his imagination in the exploits of crime-buster Fantô...
metadata.Writer: Robin Campillo, Gilles Marchand, Jean-Luc Raharimanana
metadata.Actors: Nadia Tereszkiewicz, Quim Gutiérrez, Charlie Vauselle
